text: Tarragona ( , also , , ; Phoenician: Tarqon; ) is a port city located in northeast Spain on the Costa Daurada by the Mediterranean Sea. It was founded before the 5th century BC, it is the capital of the Province of Tarragona, and part of Tarragon√®s and Catalonia. The city has a population of 201,199 (2014). ==Other websites== *Official Website of Tarragona Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:Province of Tarragona Category:Municipalities in Catalonia
